entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `System.Runtime.Serialization`'s `DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject` loses the sign when reading "-0" as a double #69019
  • Incorrect stub generated by the LibraryImportGenerator when pinning is used #69018
  • MacOS Sandboxed Universal Binaries Bundle is crashing on M1 devices every second launch. #69010
  • ObservableCollection Bug #69008
  • Default OOM exceptions to crash the process #69006
  • PAL uses wrong type for chflags flags #69005
  • Nit: UF_HIDDEN causes st_flags to get dropped #69004
  • Perf: JIT does not optimize pattern "~x + 1" #69003
  • Marshaling string.Empty across the C#<->JS boundary may be broken #69002
  • Application goes to break mode and pops up an exception when stop running application #69001
  • Perf: Interlocked.Exchange should special-case nullptr values #69000

Closed

  • how can I get "macroman" encoding #69017
  • like #24694，Interlocked.CompareExchange/Exchange still missing for UIntPtr #45103
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: add overloads to support IAsyncEnumerable with source-gen #59268
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] test failure: SIGABRT in nativeruntimeeventsource.cs #68032
  • Increase the size of the regex cache #67530
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithExpiredRevocation #68999

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • format correctly chuncked response with Content-Length header #69016
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Specify action permissions in cleanup task #69014
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Clean up specialized value num functions #69013
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement JsonContext and JsonTypeInfo Overloads for Binary Data #69012
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop (#68288)" attempt no 2 #69009
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WIP] Enable regions for nativeaot #69007
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix packs.product subset build with gcc #68998
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][arm64] Save the full 128 bit simd argument registers in the tr… #68997
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #68996
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Add Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange for UIntPtr #68966
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • CoreRT to NativeAOT renames #68950
    area-Meta
  • Fix typos #69011
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable source generator support #68985
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • Normalize S.S.Cryptography's ref.cs file #68993
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix wording in failure to load native library #68995
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow some lazy loops to upgrade with auto-atomicity #68989
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Question: why not add `IsTestProject` to project property when create a test project? #3790
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable SingleFile and Trimming analyzers when Publishing a NativeAOT app #25278
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25274
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Extension await operator to address scoped ConfigureAwait #2649
    Backlog
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor corrections to ref fields proposal #6101

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using a more verbose qualification of the identifier of the return type of a property results in name conflict-related errors #61171
  • Completion treats `:` as a commit character when providing a name in a tuple pattern #61170

Closed

  • IntelliSense doesn't show any members on structs accessed via -> #61175
  • Nullable tracking flips annotation when deconstructing iteration variable #61172

PullRequests

Created

  • EnC: Implements support for changing namespace declarations #61176
    Area-IDE
  • Merge remote-tracking branch 'dotnet/main' into `features/numeric-intptr` #61174
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41572
  • The respository does not build with `node` version 18 installed. #41571

Closed

  • Allow for additional WebApplication configuration for testing #41511
  • Accessing AuthenticationStateProvider from DbContext or Startup.cs #30982
    Backlog
  • Blazor Form Two Way Binding with Expando Object or Dictionary<string, dynamic> #41554
  • Problem with new solutions in NET 6+ templates #41569
    Discussions
  • HttpRequest with leading \r before request-line rejected with BadRequestException #40747
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a no-op IServerAddressesFeature implementation to TestServer.Features #41570
    community-contribution
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update Grpc.Core.Api version to 2.45.0 and support write cancellation #41525
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Shell] Shell currently doesn't detect pushed pages inside a Modal NavigationPage #6927
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Resources path in Maui should always use / and not the escape character \ which is Windows only #6926
  • .NET MAUI Shell - FlyoutItem - on Windows platform changing IsVisible property binding from false to true adds flyoutitem without visible title #6925
  • .NET MAUI Shell - FlyoutItem - Icon displays on Windows platform but not on Android platform #6924
  • Documented use of AutomationProperties.LabeledBy doesn't work with CollectionView #6920
  • #if WINDOWS not working correctly when referencing code in a separate Maui project #6919
  • Image cannot display device picture. #6918
  • [Entry] Cursor makes undesired jumps #6916

Closed

  • IImage - Exporting portrait JPG photos on Android rotates them #6915
  • Sample counter app is broken on macOS Monterey 12.3.1 (Xcode version 13.2.1 ) #6914
  • RC1 - DeviceStateTrigger Device not work #6366
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [Android] Button in FlexLayout not clickable #3435
    6.0.300
  • Cannot hide tab bar or change flyout display options #5932
    6.0.300
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File #5808
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout inside ScrollView doesn't size correctly #5755
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Android Image Aspect issues #2741
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Image sizing is not working as expected #2213
    6.0.300
  • ScrollView does not scroll with Flexlayout as a child #6881
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CollectionView ItemSource bound to ObservableCollection not updating on collection update #2045
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6923
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.1 to 0.11.2 #6921
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Core] Fix crash in DeviceStateTrigger #6853
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, fatal, 6.0.300
  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for MAUI Essentials #6907
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] [Shell] Fix Flyout Background so it gets set in Locked behavior mode #6901
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300

Updated

  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y
  • Change iOS Shell pop to just use GotoAsync #6912
    6.0.300
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Add Windows Icon to .exe and set Window Icon at runtime #6900
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation property between two models with "columns in common" without a join/pivot table #27979
  • Allow mapping inserts and deletes to stored procedures with TVPs #27975
  • Entity Splitting: allow optional split table #27974
  • Allow specifying different index facets per table in TPT, TPC or entity splitting #27973
  • Allow specifying different key facets per table in TPT, TPC or entity splitting #27972
  • Allow specifying different foreign key facets per table in TPT, TPC or entity splitting #27971
  • Allow specifying different column facets per table in TPT, TPC or entity splitting #27970

Closed

  • Add MaxByAsync and MinByAsync #27977
  • Unreliable DateTime comparison in `WHERE` clause #27889
  • Nested self referencing objects not correctly assigned to objects #24368
  • Temporal Tables HIDDEN (INMEMORY ISSUE?) #27949
  • Can't create a view with navigation property #27854
    6.0.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27943
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27976
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Capitalize database name #27966
  • Remove Convert node when up-casting to an interface #27964
  • Respect EvaluatableExpressionFilter in RelationalSqlTranslatingEV #27965
  • Query: Introduce EnumerableExpression which is not SQL token #27969
